summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4382 for the improvement of 6th Avenue South, from Spokane Street to Forest Street; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants, under Ordinance No. 51846, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
